author: Alison Foreman
title: Boris Johnson discharged from hospital following coronavirus care
description: Boris Johnson has returned home. After a week battling "persistent" coronavirus symptoms, the British Prime Minister left London's St. Thomas' Hospital on Sunday to continue his recovery at his country house, Chequers. Johnson announced that he tested positiv…
content:
Boris Johnson has returned home.
